RelatedSentence: Amid escalating concerns that North Korea will carry out a fourth nuclear test soon , China 's foreign minister may be coming to South Korea .
A government source said Wang Yi is likely to arrive in Seoul later this month for a three - day visit that would include talks with President Park Geun-hye and Foreign Minister Yun Byung - se .

A0: President Park Geun-hye and Foreign Minister Yun Byung-se
RelatedSentence: They are expected to affirm their joint stance on the North 's nuclear program , in that it poses a threat to regional security .
